resources.string: Hello and thanks for using Orbital Live Wallpaper. Please rate and review my apps in the Play Store (or in your own Blog :D), You can support development in three ways: Firstly by purchacing the donate version on the Play Store. Secondly by helping me up my Dropbox capacity by using me as a reference ;). Third and finally you can support development directly by contribuiting code or commentary to the project on GitHub directly. This project is 100% open source and gpl. In any case thanks for supporting PuZZleDucK Industries by installing Orbital Live Wallpaper in the first place.
1. View other PuZZleDucK Industries apps in the Play Store.
2. Join dropbox and refer PuZZleDucK Industries.
